entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Make images accessible only if Semantics have been applied #13609
  • ImageButton doesn't scale the Image when it's loaded from resource #13608
  • MaximumWidthRequest in FlexLayout is not working on macOS M1/M2 #13604
    Backlog
  • macOS map clicked event fires when tap on pin #13603
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #13600
  • SecureStorage throws InvalidProtocolBufferException on some devices #13597
    Backlog
  • DragGestureRecognizer should allow to point to another view as placeholder view #13596
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can't get started #13500
  • Missing sourceLocation metadata in assemblies when debug on iOS Platform #13548
  • [Android] Unable to change App.MainPage inside OnResume() #10024
    Backlog
  • Image does not get cleared when its Source is set to null #10165
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Grid.Children missing Add convenience methods #780
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Where is Install.ps1 ? #13595
  • Scrollview stops working with a margin set on 1st element #7186

PullRequests

Created

  • Set a GroupName when creating new WinUI RadioButtons #13611
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    area/controls 🎮
  • Backport yaml changes and update GitInfo #13607
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix test runner issues around our stubbed windows #13536
    backport/suggested
  • [housekeeping] Bump to 7.0.201 #13589
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Remove omnisharp.sln and use solution filter for mac #13605
  • Add area label to formatting PRs #13606
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Backport yaml changes to net7.0 #13602
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Don't use fixed manifest version for Tizen #13601
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.0 to 4.1.2 #13598
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump to .NET 8 Preview 2 builds #13593
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13592
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add legacy Grid method (and a better one) #13408
    t/breaking 💥, area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `BindableLayout` #13550
    area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • [RadioButton] Fix Issue with BorderWidth, Incorrect spacing in Default Control Template. #13407
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Ensure an exact measure for the nested horizontal scrollview #13554
    area/layout 🔲
  • [templates] Fix applicationId template option #13509
    area/templates 📄
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #13392
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix Flyout and TitleView Offset Measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Use the launcher to start the Windows camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
